Description: Fragments of a basket, made of organic fibre, very much decayed, tightly woven, spiral plaiting. Chaff or food content remaining.
Curator's comments: Found in the grave of adult male, near the face, containing bread and a jasper pebble.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (pp. 74, 89-90)
